items.name: func setPairwiseMasterKey(Data?)
items.desc: Sets the interface pairwise primary key (PMK).

items.name: func setPower(Bool)
items.desc: Sets the interface power state.

items.name: func setWEPKey(Data?, flags: CWCipherKeyFlags, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets the interface WEP key.

items.name: func setWLANChannel(CWChannel)
items.desc: Sets the interface channel.

items.name: func scanForNetworks(withName: String?) -> Set<CWNetwork>
items.desc: Scans for networks.

items.name: func scanForNetworks(withSSID: Data?) -> Set<CWNetwork>
items.desc: Scans for networks.

items.name: func disassociate()
items.desc: Disassociates from the current network.

items.name: func commitConfiguration(CWConfiguration, authorization: SFAuthorization?)
items.desc: Commit a configuration for the given WLAN interface.

items.name: func associate(toEnterpriseNetwork: CWNetwork, identity: SecIdentity?, username: String?, password: String?)
items.desc: Connects to the given enterprise network.

items.name: func associate(to: CWNetwork, password: String?)
items.desc: Associates to a given network using the given network passphrase.

items.name: var interfaceName: String?
items.desc: The BSD name of the interface.

items.name: func activePHYMode() -> CWPHYMode
items.desc: The current active PHY modes for the interface.

items.name: func bssid() -> String?
items.desc: The current basic service set identifier (BSSID) for the interface, returned as a UTF-8 string.

items.name: func cachedScanResults() -> Set<CWNetwork>?
items.desc: The networks currently in the scan cache for the WLAN interface.

items.name: func configuration() -> CWConfiguration?
items.desc: The current configuration for the given WLAN interface.

items.name: func countryCode() -> String?
items.desc: The current country code (ISO/IEC 3166-1:1997) for the interface.

items.name: func hardwareAddress() -> String?
items.desc: The hardware media access control (MAC) address for the interface, returned as a UTF-8 string.

items.name: func interfaceMode() -> CWInterfaceMode
items.desc: The current mode for the interface.

items.name: func noiseMeasurement() -> Int
items.desc: The current aggregate noise measurement (dBm) for the interface.

items.name: func powerOn() -> Bool
items.desc: The interface power state is set to "ON".

items.name: func rssiValue() -> Int
items.desc: The current aggregate received signal strength indication (RSSI) measurement (dBm) for the interface.

items.name: func scanForNetworks(withName: String?, includeHidden: Bool) -> Set<CWNetwork>
items.desc: Scans for networks with the name you specify, optionally including hidden networks.

items.name: func scanForNetworks(withSSID: Data?, includeHidden: Bool) -> Set<CWNetwork>
items.desc: Scans for networks with the SSID you specify, optionally including hidden networks.

items.name: func security() -> CWSecurity
items.desc: The current security mode for the interface.

items.name: func serviceActive() -> Bool
items.desc: The interface has its corresponding network service enabled.

items.name: func ssid() -> String?
items.desc: The current service set identifier (SSID) for the interface, encoded as a string.

items.name: func ssidData() -> Data?
items.desc: The current service set identifier (SSID) for the interface, returned as data.

items.name: func supportedWLANChannels() -> Set<CWChannel>?
items.desc: An array of channels supported by the interface for the active country code.

items.name: func transmitPower() -> Int
items.desc: The current transmit power (mW) for the interface.

items.name: func transmitRate() -> Double
items.desc: The current transmit rate (Mbps) for the interface.

items.name: func wlanChannel() -> CWChannel?
items.desc: The current channel for the interface.
